# Common Component Library

Available components to reuse in your page:

### `<Button />`
Props: `variant`, `size`, `onClick`, `loading`, `icon`

### `<Input />`
Props: `label`, `name`, `type`, `value`, `onChange`, `error`

### `<Modal />`
Props: `isOpen`, `onClose`, `title`, `children`

### `<Table />`
Props: `headers`, `data`, `width`

### `<StatsCard />`
Props: `icon`, `title`, `value`

### `<Typography />`
Props: `tag`, `fontWeight`, `align`, `className`

### `<Tabs />`
Props: `tabItems`, `tabContents`, `InitialActiveTab`, `onTabChange`, `width`

Always use these unless a new component is truly needed.
